name: NDE Rescue
description: Become a NDE rescuer & join the international teams that can pull you back from death!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor: x86, x64 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 compatible Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard alone, keyboard and mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: x64 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 compatible Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL compatible Additional Notes: Keyboard alone, keyboard and mouse
